channel.title: Needed an command for [PI]
channel.description: Do someone have a command that makes all players say something? like if i would like them all to say Hello etc, like ::allsay hello

item.title: Needed an command for [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

	    if (playerCommand.startsWith("command name")) {
		for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
		    final Client o = (Client) player;
		    if (player != null && o != null) {
			o.forcedChat("text");
			o.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
		    }
		}
	    }

Read full topic
